item.description: Meet Awake Friends like yourself as we watch an ongoing series of DVDs -- Eckhart Tolle speaking during retreats and intensives in recent years. For more information you can visit Eckhart Tolle Evening at Sacred Spaces http://sacredspaces.ws/gpage2.html or call me at 508-624-7519. Usually 8 to 14 people each week - many don't register through the  Meetup page.  I look forward to meeting you.   Peace, Judy
item.name: Eckhart Tolle Thursday Evenings at Sacred Spaces Meetup
